name: id
type: Type: String (cast from an integer, but not guaranteed to be a number)
description: Description: The ID of the filter in the database.

name: phrase
description: Description: The text to be filtered.

name: context
description: Description: The contexts in which the filter should be applied.

name: expires_at
type: Type: NULLABLE String (ISO 8601 Datetime), or null if the filter does not expire
description: Description: When the filter should no longer be applied.

name: irreversible
description: Description: Should matching entities in home and notifications be dropped by the server? See implementation guidelines for filters.

name: whole_word
description: Description: Should the filter consider word boundaries? See implementation guidelines for filters.
